_comment: Test fixture for a valid first release (v0.1.0). Tests the release workflow's ability to create a GitHub release with proper version format. This tests the basic release creation flow as called by bump-version.yml. Git state required: No existing tag v0.1.0, main branch checked out with at least one commit. Expected outcome: Workflow should validate version format (semantic versioning), create GitHub release with tag v0.1.0, create major tag v0 pointing to v0.1.0, generate release notes automatically. Setup: Run 'setup-test-git-state.ps1 -Scenario ValidReleaseV0' before testing.
